DOC.brief_summary: Will oral vitamin improve strength , bone quality , pain quality life . This double blind , randomize placebo control study use 10,000 IU cholecalciferol v placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Oral Cholecalciferol ( Vitamin D3 ) Bone Health , Neuromuscular Function , Quality Life Adults With Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.detailed_description: The propose study randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial supplementation oral vitamin D3 . Each subject take once-weekly capsule contain vitamin D3 identical-appearing placebo treatment period 15 week . Subjects assess Bone pain tenderness , Neuromuscular function , physical performance score , Quality life assessment . A subset subject bone biopsy perform intervention .
DOC.criteria: On dialysis Likely able complete study At least minimally ambulatory , without walk aid ( i.e. , cane walker ) Able complete various questionnaire interactively research nurse Venous access accomplish without unusual difficulty .
